tweet_text: @_adamcrowley @1059thex @PatMcAfeeShow Has the game passed Mike Tomlin?  10 Years 3 playoff wins.  Too long to fix issues.  O-line, D backfield, ILB, all took multiple years to build fix.  Tomlin was great when football was just physical but coaches have figured him out.  Easy to scout, especially late in the season.
text_en: Has the game passed Mike Tomlin? Years playoff wins. Too long to fix issues. O-line, D backfield, ILB, all took multiple years to build fix. Tomlin was great when football was just physical but coaches have figured him out. Easy to scout, especially late in the season.
reply_text: Has the game passed Mike Tomlin? Years playoff wins. Too long to fix issues. O-line, D backfield, ILB, all took multiple years to build fix. Tomlin was great when football was just physical but coaches have figured him out. Easy to scout, especially late in the season.
